item.description:
Enjoy being single and live a full life with relationships, fun, work, growth and creativity. Learn the many different lifestyles of being single and tips to enjoy your life now rather than later. Be happy now!

 

HerbPearce, M.Ed, is a relationship coach, therapist and phone coach for personal growth and relationship issues. He's a personality types expert, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living.

7:30 gather - bring vegetarian food to share

Invite others!

Playshop at 8pm

Party from 9:30 -11

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager and Wollaston and West St.
item.why: Because you want to enjoy being single even more and love your life now!
item.name: Be Single and Enjoy It!
